page.title: 10W. Buckfastleigh Shopping
page.content:
The people of the area do most of their shopping in the nearby town of {Buckfastleigh.}Ashburton and Newton Abbot, though further away, are also popular.
Various mobile services are also in operation: the general store in the neighbouring village of Holne delivers newspapers and groceries, a butcher's van comes round twice a week, and a milkman every other day. There is a weekly baker's van, and regular coal deliveries. The mobile library from Ivybridge visits the area every fortnight.
